episodes.title: THE KRUGERSDORP CULT KILLINGS with Author Jana Marx
episodes.description:
We’re joined by Jana Marx, author of The Krugersdorp Cult Killings: Inside Cecilia Steyn's Reign of Terror, who digs deep into the chilling saga of the Electus Per Deus cult. Between 2012 and 2016, a group led by Cecilia Steyn committed a series of brutal murders that shook South Africa to its core. These killings were driven by a toxic mix of religious extremism, manipulation, and revenge, with Steyn brainwashing followers into believing they were on a divine mission. Jana’s book exposes the twisted inner workings of this cult, and we’ll take you through the gruesome details of the murders, the investigation, and the eventual trial that brought the perpetrators to justice.

Don’t miss this chilling look into one of South Africa's most notorious cults and the devastating impact of their actions.

episodes.title: The Krugersdorp Cult Killers
episodes.description:
In this episode of True Crime Room, hosted by Derek Riedle, we delve into the chilling and twisted case of the Krugersdorp Cult Killers, also known as "Electus per Deus." Over four years, this group carried out a string of brutal murders, all under the guise of divine purpose. What drove this cult to such horrific acts? Was it faith, greed, or manipulation? Join Derek as he uncovers the dark truths behind the crimes and the disturbing psychology of cult leaders and their followers.

🔴 Don’t forget to like, subscribe, and hit the bell icon for more in-depth true crime stories.
